text: Gaël Bella Ondoua (born 4 November 1995) is a Cameroonian professional footballer who plays for Servette FC. ==Career== ===Club=== In April 2014, Ondoua moved from Lokomotiv Moscow to PFC CSKA Moscow. Ondoua made his professional debut on 24 September 2014 for CSKA Moscow in a Russian Cup game against FC Khimik Dzerzhinsk. In January 2015, Ondoua went on trial with FC Sakhalin Yuzhno-Sakhalinsk of the Russian National Football League. At the end of December 2017, it was reported that Ondoua had signed with FC Zorya Luhansk, however on 12 March Ondoua posted on his Instagram account that due circumstances beyond his contract he wouldn't be a Zorya Luhansk player. On 27 July 2018, he signed with the Russian Premier League club FC Anzhi Makhachkala.
